tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE content_revisions (
    revision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_id INT,
    revision_date TIMESTAMP,
    author_id INT,
    content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE versioning_info (
    version_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_id INT,
    revision_id INT,
    version_name VARCHAR(255),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ContentRevisions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content TEXT,
    revision_number INT,
    author VARCHAR(50),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE RevisionHistory (
    revision_id INT,
    revision_number INT,
    change_description TEXT,
    changed_by VARCHAR(50),
    changed_at TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (revision_id, changed_at)
);

CREATE TABLE AuditTrail (
    audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    action_performed VARCHAR(50),
    performed_by VARCHAR(50),
    performed_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE content_revisions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_id INT,
    revision_number INT,
    revision_date TIMESTAMP,
    revised_by VARCHAR(50),
    revision_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE revision_versions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    revision_id INT,
    version_number INT,
    version_date TIMESTAMP,
    version_comment TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE revision_audit_trail (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    revision_id INT,
    revision_action VARCHAR(50),
    action_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    action_by VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE content_revisions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  content TEXT,
  revision_number INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE revision_metadata (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  revision_id INT,
  editor_id INT,
  edited_at TIMESTAMP,
  notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE revision_history (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  revision_id INT,
  revision_number INT,
  action VARCHAR(10),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE version_control (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  version_number INT,
  content TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE audit_trail (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  action VARCHAR(50),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  notes TEXT
)
